name: WordPress Changelog
author: Webolatory Team

sections.description:
WordPress changelog – logs any uploads, updates, installations/uninstallations, activations/deactivations of themes, plugins and WordPress core.
It could be helpful to easily find out the moment when something went wrong with your site and quickly fix the issue.

The plugin logs such actions:
* Theme installation
* Theme update
* Theme activation
* Theme deactivation
* Theme removal
* Plugin installation
* Plugin update
* Plugin activation
* Plugin deactivation
* Plugin removal
* Translation update
* WordPress update
* WordPress reinstall
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-changelog directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Go to Dashboard -> WordPress Changelog
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Added plugins’ update errors tracking (“status”)
  • Status filter added
  • Improved database structure
  • Change Uninstall action
  • Translation bugfix

0.0.5

  • PHP 5.3 bugfixes

0.0.4

  • WPMU support added
  • Change menu position
  • Translation updates tracking added
  • WordPress reinstall tracking added
  • User actions tracking added

0.0.3

  • Ukrainian translation added
  • Search, filter and sort feature added
  • Translations updates logging added
  • Minor bugfixes

0.0.2

  • Plugin name fix

0.0.1

  • Initital release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installation

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-changelog directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Go to Dashboard -> WordPress Changelog
